```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
if (!require("pacman")) install.packages("pacman")
# jsonlite is key here (parsing JSON from proxy)
pacman::p_load(jsonlite, tidyverse, telegram.bot, lubridate, stringr, readr)


TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN <- Sys.getenv("TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN")
MY_CHAT_ID         <- Sys.getenv("MY_CHAT_ID")
bot <- Bot(token = TELEGRAM_BOT_TOKEN)


# Logging function
log_msg <- function(msg) {
  message(paste0("[", Sys.time(), "] ", msg))
}

log_msg("ğŸŒ [Global Watch] Starting Scan via Proxy...")

# [í•µì‹¬ ì „ëµ] ì§ì ‘ ì ‘ì† ëŒ€ì‹  'rss2json' ì¤‘ê³„ ì„œë²„ë¥¼ ì‚¬ìš©í•©ë‹ˆë‹¤.
# ì´ë ‡ê²Œ í•˜ë©´ êµ­ë¬´ë¶€ëŠ” ìš”ì²­ìê°€ 'GitHub'ì¸ ì¤„ ëª¨ë¦…ë‹ˆë‹¤.
target_rss <- "[https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/traveladvisories/jcr:content/par/feed.rss](https://travel.state.gov/content/travel/en/traveladvisories/traveladvisories/jcr:content/par/feed.rss)"
proxy_url  <- paste0("[https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=](https://api.rss2json.com/v1/api.json?rss_url=)", URLencode(target_rss))

csv_file <- "travel_status_memory.csv"

# Function to fetch data via Proxy
fetch_data_via_proxy <- function() {
  tryCatch({
    # 1. ì¤‘ê³„ ì„œë²„ì— ìš”ì²­ (JSON í˜•ì‹ìœ¼ë¡œ ë°›ìŒ)
    json_data <- fromJSON(proxy_url)
    
    # 2. ìƒíƒœ í™•ì¸ ('ok'ê°€ ì•„ë‹ˆë©´ ì‹¤íŒ¨)
    if (json_data$status != "ok") {
      log_msg("âš ï¸ Proxy returned error status.")
      return(NULL)
    }
    
    # 3. ë°ì´í„° ì¶”ì¶œ (items ë¦¬ìŠ¤íŠ¸)
    raw_items <- json_data$items
    
    # 4. ë°ì´í„° ì •ë¦¬
    clean_data <- raw_items %>%
      select(title, link, pubDate) %>%
      rename(item_title = title, item_link = link) %>%
      mutate(
        Country = str_trim(str_extract(item_title, "^.*?(?=\\s-\\sLevel)")),
        Level_Num = as.numeric(str_extract(item_title, "(?<=Level\\s)[0-9]")),
        Level_Text = str_trim(str_extract(item_title, "(?<=Level\\s).*")),
        # RSS2JSON returns date like "2023-11-25 10:00:00"
        Pub_Date = ymd_hms(pubDate)
      ) %>%
      filter(!is.na(Country) & !is.na(Level_Num)) %>%
      select(Country, Level_Num, Level_Text, item_link)
    
    return(clean_data)
    
  }, error = function(e) {
    log_msg(paste("âš ï¸ Proxy Error:", e$message))
    return(NULL)
  })
}

# --- Execute Logic ---

current_data <- fetch_data_via_proxy()

if (!is.null(current_data) && nrow(current_data) > 0) {
  log_msg(paste("âœ… Proxy Fetch Success! Found", nrow(current_data), "items."))
  
  # ê³¼ê±° ë°ì´í„° ë¹„êµ (ê¸°ì¡´ ë¡œì§ê³¼ ë™ì¼)
  if (file.exists(csv_file)) {
    past_data <- read_csv(csv_file, show_col_types = FALSE)
    
    comparison <- current_data %>%
      inner_join(past_data, by = "Country", suffix = c("_new", "_old")) %>%
      filter(Level_Num_new != Level_Num_old) 
      
    if (nrow(comparison) > 0) {
      for(i in 1:nrow(comparison)) {
        row <- comparison[i, ]
        emoji <- ifelse(row$Level_Num_new > row$Level_Num_old, "ğŸ“‰", "ğŸ“ˆ")
        status_msg <- ifelse(row$Level_Num_new > row$Level_Num_old, "Risk Increased", "Situation Improved")
        
        msg <- paste0(
          "ğŸ‡ºğŸ‡¸ [Travel Advisory Update]\n\n",
          "ğŸ³ï¸ Country: ", row$Country, "\n",
          emoji, " Status: ", status_msg, "\n",
          "ğŸ”¢ Level: Lv.", row$Level_Num_old, " â¡ï¸ Lv.", row$Level_Num_new, "\n",
          "ğŸ”— Link: ", row$item_link_new
        )
        try(bot$sendMessage(chat_id = MY_CHAT_ID, text = msg))
        Sys.sleep(1)
      }
      log_msg(paste("âœ… Sent alerts for", nrow(comparison), "countries."))
    } else {
      log_msg("-> No changes detected.")
    }
  } else {
    log_msg("-> [Init] Creating initial history file.")
    try(bot$sendMessage(chat_id = MY_CHAT_ID, text = "âœ… [Travel Monitor] Proxy Init Complete."))
  }
  
  # íŒŒì¼ ì €ì¥ (ì„±ê³µ ì‹œì—ë§Œ)
  write_csv(current_data, csv_file)
  log_msg(paste("ğŸ’¾ Data saved to:", csv_file))

} else {
  log_msg("âŒ Final Failure: Proxy fetch failed.")
}
